content.text:
# Battle of Mata Redonda

| combatant2        =
| commander1        =  Krzysztof Arciszewski
| commander2        =  Luis de Rojas y Borja
| strength1         = 1,500 Soldiers
| strength2         = 2,600 Soldiers
| casualties1       = Light
| casualties2       = 2,100 Killed, another great number wounded
}}
When the Portuguese sent a large armada  of thirty ships, and a large number of soldiers to put an end to Dutch Brazil in 1635. It was stopped, and soundly defeated by an outnumbered Dutch force. General Luis de Rojas y Borja died in this battle being shot in his leg.
